mapper.sql: resource_id, resource_name, resource_parent_id, resource_type, resource_icon, resource_url, resource_level, resource_show, resource_desc, resource_createtime, resource_updatetime, resource_auth
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT D.resource_id as id, D.resource_name as router, D.resource_parent_id as parent, D.resource_icon as icon, D.resource_url as path, D.resource_show as ifshow, D.resource_level as level, D.resource_auth as auth, D.resource_crumb as crumb FROM sys_user A INNER JOIN sys_user_role B ON A.user_id = B.user_id INNER JOIN sys_role_resource C ON B.role_id = C.role_id INNER JOIN sys_resource D ON C.resource_id = D.resource_id AND D.resource_type = 2 WHERE A.user_id = #{userId} AND D.resource_parent_id=#{parentId} AND A.user_del_flag = 1 ORDER BY resource_level DESC

SELECT DISTINCT D.resource_auth FROM sys_user A INNER JOIN sys_user_role B ON A.user_id = B.user_id INNER JOIN sys_role_resource C ON B.role_id = C.role_id INNER JOIN sys_resource D ON C.resource_id = D.resource_id WHERE A.user_id = #{userId} AND A.user_del_flag = 1
